title: Site-wide UI Fixes - Make It Match heiwahouse.com Quality

critical_issues.issue: PriceBadge component is terrible and doesn't match original design
critical_issues.problem: Current badge uses bg-accent with excessive styling (rounded-lg, shadow-lg, px-6 py-3) and looks amateurish
critical_issues.solution: REMOVE the PriceBadge component entirely OR make it subtle like the original - semi-transparent black overlay positioned on the image
critical_issues.reference: Original heiwahouse.com uses simple, subtle price overlay on images, not a giant orange badge

critical_issues.issue: Button colors not working - bg-accent showing as white/transparent
critical_issues.location: All buttons with bg-accent class across site
critical_issues.problem: Tailwind accent color (#ec681c) is not being applied correctly, buttons appear white or transparent
critical_issues.root_cause: The accent color utility might not be properly configured in Tailwind
critical_issues.solution: Verify tailwind.config.js has accent colors defined, add !important if needed, or use explicit hex values for critical buttons

critical_issues.problem: Some buttons use bg-accent, some use btn-primary class, some use inline styles - no consistency
critical_issues.solution: Standardize ALL primary CTAs to use the btn-primary class which is properly defined in globals.css with explicit #ec681c color

locations: Room detail page - uneven spacing between sections
critical_issues.solution: Apply consistent spacing scale: mb-6 for small gaps, mb-8 for medium, mb-12 for large sections

options.option_a: Remove PriceBadge entirely from room cards, show price in card content instead

options.option_b: Make badge subtle like original - small, semi-transparent, top-right corner

new_design.className: absolute top-4 right-4 bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-sm text-white text-sm px-3 py-1.5 rounded font-semibold
new_design.structure: Just show '80€' without the 'PER NIGHT' text

phase_1_price_badge.recommendation: Option B - match original subtle design

steps.step: Update all primary CTA buttons to use explicit class
steps.replace: btn-primary class OR explicit bg-[#ec681c] hover:bg-[#d65d16]

steps.fix: Add default button classes if none provided, ensure text-white is explicit

steps.step: Test all buttons render with orange (#ec681c) background
test_locations: Surf weeks - Email to book button

buttons.primary: btn-primary class (orange #ec681c, white text, rounded-lg, hover effects)

components_ui_price_badge.new: Subtle semi-transparent overlay OR remove entirely
components_ui_price_badge.code: className='absolute top-4 right-4 bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-sm text-white text-sm px-3 py-1.5 rounded font-semibold' and only show '80€'

app_rooms_id_page_booking_button.fix: Use btn-primary OR bg-[#ec681c] hover:bg-[#d65d16] with explicit !text-white

app_rooms_page_room_cards.fix: Either remove badge or make it subtle. Show price in card content with better typography

components_navigation.fix: Ensure it uses explicit colors or btn-primary class, verify text-white is explicit

components_floating_booking_widget.fix: Already fixed to use explicit bg-accent classes, ensure they work

All buttons have consistent hover effects
PriceBadge is either removed or subtle and professional

Site matches heiwahouse.com quality and professionalism
